structure.unit: A LICENSING OF NURSING HOME ADMINISTRATORS

law.text: This chapter may be cited as the "Kentucky Long-term Care Administrators Licensure Act of 2012."
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 129, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2012; and ch. 158, sec. 56, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 276, sec. 1.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2012). This statute was amended by 2012 Ky. Acts chs. 129 and 158, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
